name: Hearts of Iron 2 Complete
description: Includes Hearts of Iron II plus the two expansions, Doomsday and Armageddon When Germany is defeated in 1945, the Allies and the new Soviet alliance fight for supremacy. World War III is drawing closer. Play as the ruler of one of 175 countries through World Wars II and III.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP                    Processor: Pentium IV 1200 MHz                    Memory: 256 MB RAM                    Graphics: 4 MB video card DirectX compatible                    DirectX Version: 9.0 or higher                    Hard Drive: 600 MB                    Sound: DirectX compatible sound card

Amazing game, but not for the faint of heart. It does so many things well, its easy to overlook any flaws. You'll run into plenty of 'bang your head on the keyboard' moments, but usually I find that it was caused by my strategic blunders. It does lack certain aspects of depth added in HOI3, but personally I love this one more than the sequel. It just seemed so much more fun, and struck a better balance between realism and accessibility.
Best of the Hearts of Iron series thus far.
